messagebundle.msg: Enter your address here
Show direction
The address cannot be understood.
The reason for the failure is unknown.
The address is empty.
The address is unknown. It may be relatively new.
The address cannot be found due to legal or contractual reasons.
The API key is invalid.
The address lookup quota has been exceeded.
Help
Type an address, then press Enter
Use one of the following map adjustment methods to make the crosshairs in the centre of the map represent your location:
Use the up/down/left/right control buttons in the top left corner of the map (these won't appear on small maps)
Click on the map and drag it with the mouse button pressed
Use the up/down/left/right arrow keys on your keyboard

The red line shows the direction to the Qibla. You can visualise the direction better by choosing "Satellite" from the list in the top right corner of the map. Use one of the following methods to zoom in for more detail:
Use the +/- control buttons in the top left corner of the map
Use the +/- keys on your keyboard
Double-click the map
Move your mouse cursor over the map, then use the mouse wheel button
